mn113:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn113:2.2_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn113:2.3_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn113:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, asappuriso uccākulā pabbajito hoti.
mn113:3.4_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi uccākulā pabbajito, ime panaññe bhikkhū na uccākulā pabbajitā’ti.
mn113:3.5_0: So tāya uccākulīnatāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:3.7_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:3.8_0: ‘na kho uccākulīnatāya lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:3.10_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:3.11_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya uccākulīnatāya nevattānukkaṁseti na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:4-6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso mahākulā pabbajito hoti …pe…
mn113:4-6.5_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi uḷārabhogakulā pabbajito, ime panaññe bhikkhū na uḷārabhogakulā pabbajitā’ti.
mn113:4-6.6_0: So tāya uḷārabhogatāya attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:4-6.8_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:4-6.9_0: ‘na kho uḷārabhogatāya lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:4-6.11_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:4-6.12_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya uḷārabhogatāya nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso ñāto hoti yasassī.
mn113:7.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ñāto yasassī, ime panaññe bhikkhū appaññātā appesakkhā’ti.
mn113:7.4_0: So tena ñattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:7.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:7.7_0: ‘na kho ñattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:7.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:7.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena ñattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso lābhī hoti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ.
mn113:8.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṁ, ime panaññe bhikkhū na lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānan’ti.
mn113:8.4_0: So tena lābhena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:8.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:8.7_0: ‘na kho lābhena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:8.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:8.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena lābhena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:9.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso bahussuto hoti.
mn113:9.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi bahussuto, ime panaññe bhikkhū na bahussutā’ti.
mn113:9.4_0: So tena bāhusaccena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:9.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:9.7_0: ‘na kho bāhusaccena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:9.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:9.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena bāhusaccena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:10.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso vinayadharo hoti.
mn113:10.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi vinayadharo, ime panaññe bhikkhū na vinayadharā’ti.
mn113:10.4_0: So tena vinayadharattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:10.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:10.7_0: ‘na kho vinayadharattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:10.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:10.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena vinayadharattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:11.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso dhammakathiko hoti.
mn113:11.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi dhammakathiko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na dhammakathikā’ti.
mn113:11.4_0: So tena dhammakathikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:11.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:11.7_0: ‘na kho dhammakathikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:11.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:11.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena dhammakathikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:12.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso āraññiko hoti.
mn113:12.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi āraññiko ime panaññe bhikkhū na āraññikā’ti.
mn113:12.4_0: So tena āraññikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:12.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:12.7_0: ‘na kho āraññikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:12.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:12.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena āraññikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:13.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso paṁsukūliko hoti.
mn113:13.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi paṁsukūliko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṁsukūlikā’ti.
mn113:13.4_0: So tena paṁsukūlikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:13.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:13.7_0: ‘na kho paṁsukūlikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:13.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:13.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena paṁsukūlikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:14.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso piṇḍapātiko hoti.
mn113:14.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi piṇḍapātiko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na piṇḍapātikā’ti.
mn113:14.4_0: So tena piṇḍapātikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:14.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:14.7_0: ‘na kho piṇḍapātikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:14.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:14.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena piṇḍapātikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:15.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso rukkhamūliko hoti.
mn113:15.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi rukkhamūliko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na rukkhamūlikā’ti.
mn113:15.4_0: So tena rukkhamūlikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:15.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:15.7_0: ‘na kho rukkhamūlikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:15.9_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:15.10_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena rukkhamūlikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:16-20.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sosāniko hoti …pe…
mn113:16-20.7_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ekāsaniko, ime panaññe bhikkhū na ekāsanikā’ti.
mn113:16-20.8_0: So tena ekāsanikattena attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:16-20.10_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:16-20.11_0: ‘na kho ekāsanikattena lobhadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, dosadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti, mohadhammā vā parikkhayaṁ gacchanti.
mn113:16-20.13_0: so ca hoti dhammānudhammappaṭipanno sāmīcippaṭipanno anudhammacārī, so tattha pujjo, so tattha pāsaṁso’ti.
mn113:16-20.14_0: So paṭipadaṁyeva antaraṁ karitvā tena ekāsanikattena nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:21.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn113:21.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
mn113:21.4_0: So tāya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:21.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:21.8_0: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
mn113:21.9_0: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya paṭhamajjhānasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:22-24.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
mn113:22-24.5_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
mn113:22-24.6_0: So tāya catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:22-24.8_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:22-24.10_0: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
mn113:22-24.11_0: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya catutthajjhānasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:25.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn113:25.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
mn113:25.4_0: So tāya ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:25.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:25.8_0: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
mn113:25.9_0: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:26.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn113:26.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
mn113:26.4_0: So tāya viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:26.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:26.8_0: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
mn113:26.9_0: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:27.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn113:27.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
mn113:27.4_0: So tāya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:27.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:27.8_0: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
mn113:27.9_0: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:28.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, asappuriso sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn113:28.3_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā lābhī, ime panaññe bhikkhū nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā na lābhino’ti.
mn113:28.4_0: So tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā attānukkaṁseti, paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:28.6_0: Sappuriso ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
mn113:28.8_0: Yena yena hi maññanti tato taṁ hoti aññathā’ti.
mn113:28.9_0: So atammayataññeva antaraṁ karitvā tāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā nevattānukkaṁseti, na paraṁ vambheti.
mn113:29.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sappuriso sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati.
mn113:29.1_1: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
mn113:29.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na kiñci maññati, na kuhiñci maññati, na kenaci maññatī”ti.
mn113:29.4_0: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
